name: RealGamers
description: “Real Gamers isn’t just about being a gamer, it’s about being apart of something big yet to come. Our team is working around the clock to bring this community a platform in the gaming community. Not only do we want to start our own Esports organization, we want to develop a MMORPG where you can use your $RGMS. This is just the start to our many future ventures. Thank you for being apart of this community, you’re the real gamer here.”
